subtitle.en: Quickly master the use of Scripting app.
subtitle.zh: 快速掌握 Scripting 应用的使用。
API 调整与更新
subtitle.en: API Adjustments and Updates
It allows direct manipulation of the navigation history using a bound observable array.
subtitle.zh: 允许使用绑定的可观察数组直接操作导航历史。

subtitle.en: Implements selectable and multiselectable list features.
subtitle.zh: 实现单选和多选的列表功能。

subtitle.en: A high-level component in Scripting that provides built-in drag-to-reorder capability.
subtitle.zh: 提供内置的拖拽重排功能的高级组件。

subtitle.en: These apis allow developers to render any view inside a system PiP window.
subtitle.zh: 这些 API 允许开发者在系统画中画窗口中渲染任何视图。

subtitle.en: This component is intended for media-centric scenarios where native playback behavior, PiP, Now Playing integration, and background playback are required.
subtitle.zh: 该组件适用于需要原生播放行为、画中画、Now Playing 集成以及后台播放的媒体中心场景。

subtitle.en: The interface to store data in Keychain.
subtitle.zh: 存储数据到钥匙串的接口。

subtitle.en: This interface enables you to create and manage events in iOS calendars, with properties like title, location, dates, attendees, and recurrence.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您在 iOS 日历中创建和管理事件，设置标题、位置、日期、参与者和重复规则等属性。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to create, edit, and manage reminders in a calendar. This includes setting titles, due dates, priorities, and recurrence rules.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您在日历中创建、编辑和管理提醒事项，包括设置标题、到期日、优先级和重复规则。

subtitle.en: This class represents a reminder rule that can be attached to both CalendarEvent and Reminder objects.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示可以附加到 CalendarEvent 和 Reminder 对象的提醒规则。

subtitle.en: This class is used to format Date objects into strings, or parse strings into Date objects.
subtitle.zh: 用于将 Date 类型格式化为字符串，或将字符串解析为 Date。

subtitle.en: SnippetIntent is a special kind of AppIntent whose purpose is to render interactive Snippet UI cards inside the Shortcuts app (iOS 26+).
subtitle.zh: SnippetIntent 是一种特殊类型的 AppIntent，可在 Shortcuts 中生成原生的 Snippet UI 卡片。

subtitle.en: This method requests the system to bring the Scripting app to the foreground while a Shortcut is running.
subtitle.zh: 此方法请求系统将 Scripting 应用程序调至前台，同时运行快捷指令。

subtitle.en: This method pauses script execution and asks the user to confirm an action through a system-managed confirmation UI.
subtitle.zh: 此方法暂停脚本执行，请求用户通过系统管理的确认 UI 确认动作。

subtitle.en: A lightweight, session-based storage for sharing state across multiple AppIntents during a single Shortcut execution.
subtitle.zh: 一个轻量级，会话级的存储，可在单个快捷指令执行过程中跨多 AppIntent 共享状态。

subtitle.en: Liquid Glass visual system introduced in iOS 26.
subtitle.zh: 在 iOS 26 中引入的液态玻璃视觉系统。

subtitle.en: How Liquid Glass materials animate during view changes.
subtitle.zh: 视图变化过程中液态玻璃材料的动画效果。

subtitle.en: Use the Toolbar component to populate a view’s navigation or toolbar area with various items.
subtitle.zh: 使用 Toolbar 组件在视图的导航栏或工具栏区域中添加各种项目。

subtitle.en: Displays a set of child views in a tabbed interface.
subtitle.zh: 在标签界面中显示子视图集。

title.zh: 新的 List 视图修饰符

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow you to customize how sections behave and appear inside a <List> component.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于精细控制 <List> 中每一个区块（Section）的布局与样式。

subtitle.en: It is designed to create rectangles with progressively inset (concentric) corner geometry, which adapts naturally to modern UI designs.
subtitle.zh: 它是用于创建逐步缩进（浓缩）角几何形状的矩形，适合现代 UI 设计。

subtitle.en: This view modifier establishes a geometric relationship between different views, allowing them to animate smoothly when transitioning across different layouts, different containers, different conditional render states, different size and position configurations.
subtitle.zh: 该视图修饰符允许你在不同的布局，不同的容器，不同的条件渲染状态，不同的尺寸和位置配置之间进行平滑的过渡动画。

subtitle.en: This view modifier marks a view as the geometric source of a navigation transition.
subtitle.zh: 该视图修饰符允许你标记一个视图为导航过渡的几何源。

subtitle.en: This view is used to create and manage a geometry animation namespace.
subtitle.zh: 该视图用于创建和管理几何动画命名空间。

subtitle.en: The interface for managing local notification-related activities.
subtitle.zh: 用于管理本地通知相关活动的接口。

subtitle.en: This interface provides low-level operations such as reading, writing, retrieving attributes, and closing the file.
subtitle.zh: 通过该类，你可以对文件执行读取、写入、获取属性、关闭等底层操作。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to transfer files securely over SSH using SFTP protocol.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来使用 SFTP 协议通过 SSH 安全地传输文件。

subtitle.en: To improve the stability and performance of LiveActivity, the API has been redesigned.
subtitle.zh: 为了实现更稳定和性能更好的 LiveActivity，对 API 进行了重新设计。

subtitle.en: These modifiers used to customize the appearance of Live Activities on the Lock Screen.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于在锁屏上自定义实时活动（LiveActivity）的外观。

subtitle.en: Used to drive UI rendering and work with the animation system.
subtitle.zh: 用于驱动 UI 渲染、与动画系统协同工作。

subtitle.en: These interfaces define how view transitions occur when their properties change.
subtitle.zh: 这些接口用于定义视图在属性发生变化时的过渡效果。

subtitle.en: Allowing scripts to programmatically control scrolling position within scrollable content such as List or ScrollView.
subtitle.zh: 允许脚本在可滚动内容（例如 List 或 ScrollView）内控制滚动位置。

subtitle.en: It provides information about the size, padding, safe area, and safe area insets of the current container.
subtitle.zh: 它能够在视图构建阶段提供当前容器的尺寸、边距、安全区域和角落内边距等信息。

subtitle.en: This view allows you to read environment values from the current view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 它允许脚本在视图层级中访问当前环境的上下文信息，例如颜色模式、尺寸类别、是否正在搜索、是否被呈现、编辑模式等。

subtitle.en: Iterating over dynamic data
subtitle.zh: 迭代动态数据

subtitle.en: A high-level component in Scripting that provides built-in drag-to-reorder capability.
subtitle.zh: 提供内置的拖拽重排功能的高级组件。

subtitle.en: This view modifier allows you to set environment values for a view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于为视图层级设置环境变量。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to let you manually switch threads.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来让你手动切换线程。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to connect to remote servers using SSH protocol.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来使用 SSH 协议连接到远程服务器。

subtitle.en: Create widgets to show your script’s content on the Home screen.
subtitle.zh: 创建小组件，在主屏幕上显示脚本内容。

subtitle.en: Quickly master the use of widget.
subtitle.zh: 快速掌握小组件的使用。

subtitle.en: The Widget API provides static methods and properties to render and interact with home screen widgets.
subtitle.zh: 小组件 API 提供静态方法和属性，用于渲染和与主屏幕小组件交互。

title.zh: 小组件染色模式适配指南

subtitle.en: Learn how to adapt your widget to the tinted mode.
subtitle.zh: 了解如何将小组件适配到色调模式。

subtitle.en: This property is used to define background styles specifically for widgets, with behavior optimized for iOS 18’s accented (tinted) rendering mode.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于定义小组件的背景样式，特别是针对 iOS 18 的强调（着色）渲染模式进行了优化。

subtitle.en: This component is designed to be used inside accessory widgets—such as Lock Screen widgets or StandBy widgets.
subtitle.zh: 适用于配件类小组件（Accessory Widgets），如锁屏小组件或待机模式（StandBy）小组件。

title.zh: 在小组件和灵动岛中使用动画

subtitle.en: The views and view modifiers for displaying animation in widget and LiveActivity
subtitle.zh: 在小组件和灵动岛中播放动画的视图或者视图属性

subtitle.en: Add custom Button or Toggle controls to the Control Center or Lock Screen
subtitle.zh: 在控制中心或锁屏界面添加按钮（Button）或开关（Toggle）控件。

subtitle.en: This interface serves as the core mechanism for executing script logic behind controls in Widgets, Live Activities, and ControlWidgets.
subtitle.zh: AppIntent 为小组件，灵动岛和控制中心的控件提供了执行脚本逻辑的核心机制。

subtitle.en: An interface for providing an app-specific capability that people invoke from system experiences like Siri and the Shortcuts app.
subtitle.zh: 提供特定于应用程序的功能接口，可通过 Siri 或快捷指令等系统体验来调用。

subtitle.en: Quickly master the use of Intents.
subtitle.zh: 快速掌握 Intent 的使用。

subtitle.en: SnippetIntent is a special kind of AppIntent whose purpose is to render interactive Snippet UI cards inside the Shortcuts app (iOS 26+).
subtitle.zh: SnippetIntent 是一种特殊类型的 AppIntent，可在 Shortcuts 中生成原生的 Snippet UI 卡片。

subtitle.en: This method requests the system to bring the Scripting app to the foreground while a Shortcut is running.
subtitle.zh: 此方法请求系统将 Scripting 应用程序调至前台，同时运行快捷指令。

subtitle.en: This method pauses script execution and asks the user to confirm an action through a system-managed confirmation UI.
subtitle.zh: 此方法暂停脚本执行，请求用户通过系统管理的确认 UI 确认动作。

subtitle.en: Views are the building blocks that you use to declare the user interface.
subtitle.zh: 视图是用于声明用户界面的基本构造块。

subtitle.en: Present views by your script.
subtitle.zh: 通过脚本展示视图。

subtitle.en: Use Navigation.present to present a simple view.
subtitle.zh: 使用Navigation.present展示视图。

subtitle.en: Use Navigation.useDismiss to dismiss a view.
subtitle.zh: 使用Navigation.useDismiss关闭视图。

subtitle.en: Display formatted text.
subtitle.zh: 显示格式化文本。

subtitle.en: These views allow you to display live-updating or formatted date and time strings in widgets and views.
subtitle.zh: 这些视图支持在小组件和视图中显示实时更新的日期与时间格式。

subtitle.en: Add images and symbols to your app’s user interface.
subtitle.zh: 在应用的用户界面中添加图像和符号。

subtitle.en: A control that initiates an action.
subtitle.zh: 一个用于触发点击操作的控件。

subtitle.en: Arrange views inside built-in layout containers like stacks and grids.
subtitle.zh: 在内置布局容器（如VStack和Grid）中排列视图。

subtitle.en: A view that arranges its subviews in a horizontal line.
subtitle.zh: 一个在水平方向排列子视图的视图。

subtitle.en: A view that arranges its subviews in a vertical line.
subtitle.zh: 一个在垂直方向排列子视图的视图。

subtitle.en: A view that overlays its subviews, aligning them in both axes.
subtitle.zh: 一个在视觉上叠加子视图，并在两个轴上对齐的视图。

subtitle.en: A container view that arranges other views in a two dimensional layout.
subtitle.zh: 一个将其他视图以二维布局排列的容器视图。

subtitle.en: A view that arranges its children in a line that grows horizontally, creating items only as needed.
subtitle.zh: 一个按照水平方向扩展，并在需要时才创建子视图的容器视图。

subtitle.en: A view that arranges its children in a line that grows vertically, creating items only as needed.
subtitle.zh: 一个按照垂直方向扩展，并在需要时才创建子视图的容器视图。

subtitle.en: A container view that arranges its child views in a grid that grows horizontally, creating items only as needed.
subtitle.zh: 一个以水平方向扩展的网格视图，并仅在需要时创建子视图。

subtitle.en: A container view that arranges its child views in a grid that grows vertically, creating items only as needed.
subtitle.zh: 一个以垂直方向扩展的网格视图，并仅在需要时创建子视图。

subtitle.en: This view is a flow-based layout component that arranges its children horizontally and automatically wraps items to the next line when there is insufficient space.
subtitle.zh: 这个视图是一个流式布局组件，它按照水平方向排列子视图，并在没有足够空间时自动换行。

subtitle.en: Get text input from the user.
subtitle.zh: 从用户获取文本输入。

subtitle.en: A control that displays an editable text interface.
subtitle.zh: 显示可编辑文本界面的控件。

subtitle.en: A control into which people securely enter private text.
subtitle.zh: 一种可供安全输入私人文本的控件。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to interact with the software keyboard.
subtitle.zh: 通过这个接口与软件键盘交互。

subtitle.en: Display values and get user selections.
subtitle.zh: 显示数值并获取用户选择。

subtitle.en: A control that toggles between on and off states.
subtitle.zh: 一个在开启和关闭状态之间进行切换的控件。

subtitle.en: A control that performs increment and decrement actions.
subtitle.zh: 一个执行递增和递减操作的控件。

subtitle.en: A control for selecting a value from a bounded linear range of values.
subtitle.zh: 一个在设定范围内选择数值的控件。

subtitle.en: A view that shows the progress toward completion of a task.
subtitle.zh: 一个显示任务完成进度的视图。

subtitle.en: A control for selecting from a set of mutually exclusive values.
subtitle.zh: 一个从一组选项值中进行选择的控件。

subtitle.en: A control for selecting an absolute date.
subtitle.zh: 一个用于选择具体日期的控件。

subtitle.en: A control used to select a color from the system color picker UI.
subtitle.zh: 一个从系统颜色选择器界面中选取颜色的控件。

subtitle.en: A view that shows a value within a range.
subtitle.zh: 一个在一定范围内显示数值的仪表盘样式的视图。

subtitle.en: An interface, consisting of a label and additional content, that you display when the content of your app is unavailable to users.
subtitle.zh: 当应用的内容对用户不可用时，用于显示标签和其他内容的界面。

subtitle.en: This view can be used to open web pages, app-specific URLs, or other schemes.
subtitle.zh: 这个视图可以用来打开网页、应用特定的URL或其他协议。

subtitle.en: This view can be used to render SVG images.
subtitle.zh: 这个视图可以用来渲染SVG图像。

subtitle.en: Use a menu to provide people with easy access to common commands.
subtitle.zh: 使用菜单为用户提供便捷的常用命令访问。

subtitle.en: Draw shapes like circles and rectangles, as well as custom paths that define shapes of your own design.
subtitle.zh: 绘制圆形、矩形等形状，并可使用自定义路径来定义自己设计的形状。

subtitle.en: It is designed to create rectangles with progressively inset (concentric) corner geometry, which adapts naturally to modern UI designs.
subtitle.zh: 它是用于创建逐步缩进（浓缩）角几何形状的矩形，适合现代 UI 设计。

subtitle.en: Use a list to display a one-dimensional vertical collection of views.
subtitle.zh: 使用列表显示一维的垂直视图集合。

subtitle.en: A view that shows or hides another content view, based on the state of a disclosure control.
subtitle.zh: 一个根据展开控制状态来显示或隐藏其他内容视图的视图。

subtitle.en: Sets the style for lists within this view.
subtitle.zh: 设置此视图中列表的样式。

subtitle.en: Adds custom swipe actions to a row in a list.
subtitle.zh: 为列表中的行添加自定义滑动操作。

subtitle.en: Pull down to refresh on a list view.
subtitle.zh: 为列表中的行添加下拉刷新

subtitle.en: Implements selectable and multiselectable list features.
subtitle.zh: 实现单选和多选的列表功能。

subtitle.en: Move and delete list item.
subtitle.zh: 移动和删除列表项。

subtitle.en: Present views in different kinds of purpose-driven containers, like forms or control groups.
subtitle.zh: 在不同用途的容器（如表单或控件组）中呈现视图。

subtitle.en: Grouping views into a container
subtitle.zh: 将视图分组到容器中

subtitle.en: Organizing views into sections
subtitle.zh: 将视图分区组织

subtitle.en: Iterating over dynamic data
subtitle.zh: 迭代动态数据

subtitle.en: Grouping views into a box
subtitle.zh: 将视图分组到一个方框中

subtitle.en: A container for grouping controls used for data entry, such as in settings or inspectors.
subtitle.zh: 一个用于分组输入控件的容器，可用于设置或检查器等场景。

subtitle.en: A container view that displays semantically-related controls in a visually-appropriate manner for the context.
subtitle.zh: 一个在语义相关的上下文中，以合适的视觉方式显示控件的容器视图。

subtitle.en: Enable people to scroll to content that doesn’t fit in the current display.
subtitle.zh: 允许用户滚动查看当前显示区域无法容纳的内容。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a gesture system similar to SwiftUI, allowing any view to respond to touch interactions such as tapping, long pressing, dragging, rotating, and magnifying.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了类似于 SwiftUI 的手势系统，允许任何视图响应触摸交互，如轻点、长按、拖拽、旋转和放大。

subtitle.en: This view is used to create and manage a geometry animation namespace.
subtitle.zh: 该视图用于创建和管理几何动画命名空间。

subtitle.en: Enable people to move between different parts of your script’s view hierarchy within a scene.
subtitle.zh: 允许用户在脚本的视图层级中各个部分之间进行导航。

subtitle.en: A view that displays a root view and enables you to present additional views over the root view.
subtitle.zh: 一个显示根视图并允许在根视图上呈现其他视图的视图。

subtitle.en: It allows direct manipulation of the navigation history using a bound observable array.
subtitle.zh: 允许使用绑定的可观察数组直接操作导航历史。

subtitle.en: A view that switches between multiple child views using interactive user interface elements.
subtitle.zh: 一个通过交互式界面元素在多个子视图之间切换的视图。

subtitle.en: Displays a set of child views in a tabbed interface.
subtitle.zh: 在标签界面中显示子视图集。

title.zh: 包含多个可滚动页面的 TabView
分栏导航视图（适用于 iPad）

subtitle.en: A view that presents views in two or three columns, where selections in leading columns control presentations in subsequent columns.
subtitle.zh: 一个在两个或三个栏中展示视图的视图，前置栏的选择会控制后续栏的展示。

subtitle.en: An view that displays interactive web content.
subtitle.zh: 一个用于显示交互式网页内容的视图。

subtitle.en: This interface provides some shortcut methods for displaying dialog boxes.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一些用于显示对话框的快捷方法。

subtitle.en: Present content in a separate view that offers focused interaction.
subtitle.zh: 在单独的视图中呈现内容，以提供更专注的交互。

subtitle.en: Provide immediate access to frequently used commands and controls.
subtitle.zh: 为用户提供快速访问常用命令和控件。

subtitle.en: Enable people to search for text or other content within your script UI.
subtitle.zh: 允许用户在脚本界面内搜索文本或其他内容。

subtitle.en: Allowing scripts to programmatically control scrolling position within scrollable content such as List or ScrollView.
subtitle.zh: 允许脚本在可滚动内容（例如 List 或 ScrollView）内控制滚动位置。

subtitle.en: It provides information about the size, padding, safe area, and safe area insets of the current container.
subtitle.zh: 它能够在视图构建阶段提供当前容器的尺寸、边距、安全区域和角落内边距等信息。

subtitle.en: This view allows you to read environment values from the current view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 它允许脚本在视图层级中访问当前环境的上下文信息，例如颜色模式、尺寸类别、是否正在搜索、是否被呈现、编辑模式等。

subtitle.en: This component is designed to be used inside accessory widgets—such as Lock Screen widgets or StandBy widgets.
subtitle.zh: 适用于配件类小组件（Accessory Widgets），如锁屏小组件或待机模式（StandBy）小组件。

subtitle.en: Transform your data into informative visualizations.
subtitle.zh: 将您的数据转换为信息丰富的可视化图表。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a series of points connected by straight lines.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一系列点并通过直线连接的图表。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as rectangular bars with lengths proportional to the values they represent.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为矩形条形，其长度与所代表的值成比例的图表。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as rectangles, where the size and color of each rectangle represent different data values.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为矩形的图表，其中每个矩形的大小和颜色代表不同的数据值。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a series of rules, which can be used to represent thresholds or limits.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一系列标尺的图表，可用于表示阈值或限制。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a series of points connected by lines, with categories on the a specified axis.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一系列点并通过线连接的图表，其中一个轴上有指定的类别。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as stacked bars, where each bar represents a total and is divided into segments representing sub-values.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为堆叠条形的图表，其中每个条形代表总值，并被分割成表示子值的段。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as groups of bars, where each group represents a category and the bars within the group represent sub-categories.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为分组条形的图表，其中每个组代表一个类别，组内的条形代表子类别。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as stacked areas, where each area represents a total and is divided into segments representing sub-values.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为堆叠面积的图表，其中每个面积代表总值，并被分割成表示子值的段。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as horizontal bars, typically used to represent project schedules or timelines.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为水平条形的图表，通常用于表示项目进度或时间线。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as areas between two lines, representing a range of values.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为两条线之间的面积的图表，表示一系列值。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a single-dimensional bar, typically used for representing a single value or category.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一维条形的图表，通常用于表示单个值或类别。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as individual points, typically used for scatter plots or discrete data.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为单个点的图表，通常用于散点图或离散数据。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as points categorized by a specific axis, useful for visualizing discrete data with categories.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为按特定轴分类的点的图表，适用于可视化具有类别的离散数据。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a matrix of colors, where each color represents a value in a two-dimensional space.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为颜色矩阵的图表，其中每种颜色代表二维空间中的一个值。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as rectangular areas, where the size and color of each rectangle represent different data values.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为矩形面积的图表，其中每个矩形的大小和颜色代表不同的数据值。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as slices of a pie, where each slice represents a proportion of the whole.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为饼图切片的图表，其中每个切片代表整体的一部分。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a donut shape, similar to a pie chart but with a hole in the center.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为环形的图表，类似于饼图，但中间有一个空心部分。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a series of lines, with rules indicating specific values or thresholds.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一系列线条的图表，规则指示特定值或阈值。

subtitle.en: A chart that displays data as a series of lines, with labels indicating specific values or thresholds.
subtitle.zh: 一个将数据表示为一系列线条的图表，标签指示特定值或阈值。

subtitle.en: An example that demonstrates how to use multiple charts in a single view.
subtitle.zh: 一个演示如何在单个视图中使用多个图表的示例。

subtitle.en: A view that renders Markdown content, allowing you to display formatted text, links, images, and more.
subtitle.zh: 一个渲染 Markdown 内容的视图，允许您显示格式化文本、链接、图片等。

subtitle.en: A powerful code editor that can be controlled programmatically or embedded into a user interface.
subtitle.zh: 一个提供富文本编辑界面的视图。

subtitle.en: This component is intended for media-centric scenarios where native playback behavior, PiP, Now Playing integration, and background playback are required.
subtitle.zh: 该组件适用于需要原生播放行为、画中画、Now Playing 集成以及后台播放的媒体中心场景。

subtitle.en: The type declarations of Scripting APIs.
subtitle.zh: Scripting API 的类型声明。

subtitle.en: The Color API supports various color formats, including HEX strings, RGBA strings, and predefined color keywords
subtitle.zh: Color API 支持多种颜色格式，包括 HEX 字符串、RGBA 字符串以及预定义的颜色关键字。

subtitle.en: This type defines how colors, gradients, and materials can be applied to a view’s foreground or background, mirroring the styling capabilities found in SwiftUI.
subtitle.zh: 该类型定义了如何将颜色、渐变和材质应用于视图的前景或背景，类似于 SwiftUI 中的样式功能。

keywords: 带渐变或不透明度的颜色

subtitle.en: This type allows you to define two distinct styles for a shape—one for light mode and another for dark mode. The system automatically applies the appropriate style based on the current color scheme (light or dark) of the user’s device.
subtitle.zh: 这个类型允许为一个形状定义两种不同的样式——一种用于浅色模式，另一种用于深色模式。系统会根据用户设备的当前配色方案（浅色或深色）自动应用适合的样式。

subtitle.en: The Alignment type defines how to position content within a view’s frame, mirroring the behavior of SwiftUI’s built-in alignments.
subtitle.zh: Alignment 类型定义了如何在视图的框架内定位内容，类似于 SwiftUI 内置对齐方式的行为。

subtitle.en: This property defines a visual clipping or background shape used in view modifiers such as clipShape, background, or border.
subtitle.zh: 用于定义视图的裁剪形状或背景形状。

subtitle.en: View modifiers allows you to customize the behavior and appearance of views.
subtitle.zh: 视图修饰器允许您自定义视图的行为和外观。

subtitle.en: This property defines the size and alignment of a view.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于设置视图的尺寸（固定或弹性）以及在容器中的对齐方式。

subtitle.en: Positions the view within an invisible frame whose size and position are relative to its nearest container.
subtitle.zh: 将当前视图放置在一个相对于其最近容器尺寸的“隐形框架”中。该修饰符适用于 ScrollView、Grid、布局栈等容器中，用于实现按比例布局或视图对齐。

subtitle.en: These two properties allow you to customize the visual styling of view content and its background.
subtitle.zh: 用于设置视图前景与背景视觉效果的两个常用属性。

subtitle.en: This property is used to define background styles specifically for widgets, with behavior optimized for iOS 18’s accented (tinted) rendering mode.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于定义小组件的背景样式，特别是针对 iOS 18 的强调（着色）渲染模式进行了优化。

subtitle.en: This property adds a border around the view.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于为视图添加边框。

subtitle.en: This property adds space around the content of a view.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于设置视图内容与其边缘之间的间距。

subtitle.en: Sets the transparency level of a view.
subtitle.zh: 设置视图的不透明度。

subtitle.en: These interfaces define how view transitions occur when their properties change.
subtitle.zh: 这些接口用于定义视图在属性发生变化时的过渡效果。

subtitle.en: Sets the visibility of a view.
subtitle.zh: 设置视图是否可见。

subtitle.en: Hides the labels of controls contained within the view.
subtitle.zh: 隐藏视图内控件的标签部分，但控件本身仍然显示。

subtitle.en: Disables user interactions for this view and its children.
subtitle.zh: 禁用当前视图及其子视图的用户交互行为，视觉上通常为半透明状态。

subtitle.en: This view modifier places a view on top of the modified view, creating a layered composition.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于在当前视图的上方叠加一个额外视图，形成层叠的视觉效果。

subtitle.en: This view modifier clips the visual rendering of a view using the **alpha channel** of another view.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符使用另一个视图的透明度（alpha 通道）作为遮罩，将目标视图按形状进行裁剪。

subtitle.en: Clips the view to the specified shape while maintaining its aspect ratio.
subtitle.zh: 将视图裁剪为指定形状，并保持内容比例。

subtitle.en: Clips the view to its rectangular bounds.
subtitle.zh: 将视图裁剪为其矩形边界

subtitle.en: Positions the center of the view at the given x and y coordinates within its parent’s coordinate space.
subtitle.zh: 将视图的中心点定位到父视图坐标空间中的指定位置。

subtitle.en: Moves the view from its original position by the specified x and y distances.
subtitle.zh: 将视图从其默认位置沿 x 和 y 方向偏移指定的距离。

subtitle.en: Rotates the view by a specified angle in degrees.
subtitle.zh: 将视图绕指定锚点旋转指定角度。

subtitle.en: Scales the view horizontally and vertically.
subtitle.zh: 按指定倍数缩放视图的渲染结果。

subtitle.en: Applies a shadow behind the view.
subtitle.zh: 为视图添加阴影效果。

subtitle.en: Applies a Gaussian blur effect to the view.
subtitle.zh: 对视图应用高斯模糊效果。

subtitle.en: Sets the preferred system appearance (light or dark) for the view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 指定该视图层级使用的系统配色模式（浅色或深色）。

subtitle.en: Overrides the default accent color for a specific view using a given style.
subtitle.zh: 用于为视图设置局部的强调色，覆盖默认的系统 accent color。

subtitle.en: Inverts the colors in this view.
subtitle.zh: 反转视图的颜色，用于视觉强调或辅助功能场景。

subtitle.en: This property defines the interactive or visual boundary shape of a view's content.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于定义视图内容的交互区域或视觉边界形状。

subtitle.en: The properties allows you to customize the layout and appearance of a text or label view.
subtitle.zh: 这些属性允许您自定义文本或标签视图的布局和外观。

subtitle.en: Fixes the size of a view to its ideal dimensions.
subtitle.zh: 将视图固定在其理想大小，防止其被压缩或扩展超出其内容本身所需的尺寸。

subtitle.en: These modifiers are specifically designed for views that render images.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符专门用于控制图像视图的缩放、布局与渲染方式。

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow you to customize how SF Symbols are displayed and animated inside views.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符用于配置 SF Symbols（系统符号图标）的显示样式和动画效果

subtitle.en: The buttonStyle property allows you to customize the interaction behavior and appearance of buttons within a view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 这个属性允许您自定义视图层级中按钮的交互行为和外观。

subtitle.en: The controlGroupStyle property allows you to set the visual and interactive style for control groups within your view, reflecting the look and feel found in SwiftUI.
subtitle.zh: controlGroupStyle 属性允许您为视图中的控件组设置视觉和交互样式，类似于 SwiftUI 中的外观。

subtitle.en: The listStyle property allows you to customize the behavior and appearance of a list in your UI when using the List view.
subtitle.zh: listStyle 属性允许您在使用 List 视图时自定义列表的行为和外观。

subtitle.en: The pickerStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and behavior of pickers within a view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: pickerStyle 属性允许您自定义视图层级中选择器的外观和行为。

subtitle.en: The progressViewStyle property allows you to customize the appearance of a progress view.
subtitle.zh: progressViewStyle 属性允许您自定义进度视图的外观。

subtitle.en: The datePickerStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and interaction of the DatePicker view.
subtitle.zh: datePickerStyle 属性允许您自定义 DatePicker 视图的外观和交互。

subtitle.en: The formStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and interaction of the Form view.
subtitle.zh: formStyle 属性允许您自定义 Form 视图的外观和交互。

subtitle.en: These modifiers customize the behavior and appearance of TextField components.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于自定义 TextField 组件的行为和外观，包括键盘类型、自动更正、自动大写、提交操作等。

subtitle.en: The textFieldStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and interaction of the TextField view.
subtitle.zh: textFieldStyle 属性允许您自定义 TextField 视图的外观和交互。

subtitle.en: The toggleStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and interaction of the Toggle view.
subtitle.zh: toggleStyle 属性允许您自定义 Toggle 视图的外观和交互。

subtitle.en: The gaugeStyle property allows you to customize the appearance and interaction of the Gauge view.
subtitle.zh: gaugeStyle 属性允许您自定义 Gauge 视图的外观和交互。

subtitle.en: These modifiers customize the behavior and appearance of Liquid Glass components.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于自定义 Liquid Glass 组件的行为和外观，包括颜色、透明度等。

subtitle.en: Liquid Glass visual system introduced in iOS 26.
subtitle.zh: 在 iOS 26 中引入的液态玻璃视觉系统。

subtitle.en: How Liquid Glass materials animate during view changes.
subtitle.zh: 视图变化过程中液态玻璃材料的动画效果。

subtitle.en: The toolbar property allows you to populate a view’s navigation or toolbar area with various items.
subtitle.zh: toolbar 属性允许您在视图的导航栏或工具栏区域中添加各种项目。

subtitle.en: Use ToolbarProps to simply set a toolbar.
subtitle.zh: 使用 ToolbarProps 简单设置工具栏

subtitle.en: Use the Toolbar component to populate a view’s navigation or toolbar area with various items.
subtitle.zh: 使用 Toolbar 组件在视图的导航栏或工具栏区域中添加各种项目。

subtitle.en: Control the visibility, appearance, and behavior of system toolbars.
subtitle.zh: 用于控制系统工具栏（包括导航栏、底部工具栏、标签栏等）的可见性、外观样式以及行为。

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow for the customization of navigation titles, title display styles, and back button behavior—closely following the conventions of SwiftUI's navigation system.
subtitle.zh: toolbar 属性允许您在视图的导航栏或工具栏区域中添加各种项目。

subtitle.en: These modifiers used to customize the appearance of Live Activities on the Lock Screen.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于在锁屏上自定义实时活动（LiveActivity）的外观。

subtitle.en: The properties allows you to customize the appearance of the chart view.
subtitle.zh: 这些属性允许您自定义图表视图的外观。

subtitle.en: These properties allow you to set the style, symbol, position, annotation, transformation, etc. of each chart mark.
subtitle.zh: 这些属性允许您设置每个图表标记的样式、符号、位置、注解、变换等内容。

subtitle.en: Marks a scrollable view as refreshable, enabling the user to pull down to trigger an asynchronous data reload.
subtitle.zh: 将可滚动视图标记为可刷新，允许用户下拉以触发异步的数据刷新操作。

subtitle.en: You can add a search bar, control its visibility and placement, react to changes in input, and display dynamic suggestions.
subtitle.zh: 你可以为列表等滚动视图添加搜索栏，控制搜索栏的显示位置、状态，监听输入变化，并动态显示搜索建议。

subtitle.en: You can attach swipe actions to views used as rows in a <List> (such as <HStack>) to support contextual interactions like deleting, editing, marking favorites, etc.
subtitle.zh: 你可以为用作 <List> 列表行的视图（如 <HStack>）添加滑动操作按钮，支持如“删除”、“编辑”、“收藏”等常见交互。

subtitle.en: These properties allow you to adjust layout behavior relative to the system-defined safe areas.
subtitle.zh: 这些属性允许你灵活地向安全区域内插入视图内容，或让视图忽略安全区域限制进行全屏布局。

subtitle.en: These properties are used to control the layout behavior of individual views placed inside a Grid structure.
subtitle.zh: 这些属性用于控制视图在 Grid 网格布局中的行为，包括单元格的跨列、对齐方式、尺寸限制等，适用于构建灵活且精细的二维界面布局。

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow you to customize how rows and sections behave and appear inside a <List> component.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于精细控制 <List> 中每一行（Row）或每一个区块（Section）的布局与样式。

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow you to customize how rows behave and appear inside a <List> component.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于精细控制 <List> 中每一行（Row）的布局与样式。

title.zh: 新的 List 视图修饰符

subtitle.en: These modifiers allow you to customize how sections behave and appear inside a <List> component.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符可用于精细控制 <List> 中每一个区块（Section）的布局与样式。

subtitle.en: This view modifier displays a temporary notification message (toast) over the current view.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰器用于在视图上显示一个临时提示框（Toast）。

subtitle.en: These view modifiers customize the appearance, sizing, and interaction behavior of views presented using sheet.
subtitle.zh: 这些修饰符用于配置通过 sheet 呈现的视图的行为和外观。

subtitle.en: This property allows a view to present a contextual menu when the user performs a long-press or right-click gesture.
subtitle.zh: 该属性用于为任意视图添加系统风格的上下文菜单。

subtitle.en: This view modifier configures custom margins around a view’s content.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于为视图内容添加自定义的外边距。

subtitle.en: This view modifier specifies a transition animation to apply when the content within a single view changes.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于指定当视图内容发生变化时所应用的动画过渡效果。

subtitle.en: This view modifier establishes a geometric relationship between different views, allowing them to animate smoothly when transitioning across different layouts, different containers, different conditional render states, different size and position configurations.
subtitle.zh: 该视图修饰符允许你在不同的布局，不同的容器，不同的条件渲染状态，不同的尺寸和位置配置之间进行平滑的过渡动画。

subtitle.en: This view modifier marks a view as the geometric source of a navigation transition.
subtitle.zh: 该视图修饰符允许你标记一个视图为导航过渡的几何源。

subtitle.en: Determines whether the view should horizontally mirror its contents when the system layout direction is right-to-left (RTL).
subtitle.zh: 设置当系统使用从右到左（Right-to-Left, RTL）布局方向时，当前视图是否应水平镜像其内容。

subtitle.en: This view modifier apply redaction to a view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于指定当视图内容发生变化时所应用的动画过渡效果。

subtitle.en: The lifecycle hooks to execute custom logic when a view becomes visible or is removed from the visible interface.
subtitle.zh: 用于在视图显示或从界面中消失时执行自定义逻辑。

subtitle.en: The view modifier allows a view in your script to act as a drop target, accepting files, images, or text dragged in from other apps.
subtitle.zh: 用于使某个视图成为接收来自其他 App 拖入的文件、图片或文本的拖放目标。

subtitle.en: These apis allow developers to render any view inside a system PiP window.
subtitle.zh: 这些 API 允许开发者在系统画中画窗口中渲染任何视图。

subtitle.en: This view modifier is used to provide a translation service context to your UI.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于为视图层级提供翻译服务的上下文环境。

subtitle.en: This view modifier specifies a layout priority for a view.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于为视图指定布局优先级。

subtitle.en: This view modifier allows you to set environment values for a view hierarchy.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符用于为视图层级设置环境变量。

subtitle.en: This view modifier allows you to chain multiple modifiers together, supporting the same modifier being used multiple times in the same view.
subtitle.zh: 该修饰符可用于连续调用多个修饰符，支持同一个修饰符在同一个视图中多次使用。

subtitle.en: Display your Script’s data in the Dynamic Island and on the Lock Screen and offer quick interactions.
subtitle.zh: 在动态岛和锁屏上展示脚本的数据，并提供快速交互方式。

title.zh: 可互动的小组件和灵动岛

subtitle.en: To create dynamic and interactive UIs using Button and Toggle views.
subtitle.zh: 通过 Button 和 Toggle 组件创建动态、交互式的 UI。

subtitle.en: Create custom keyboards with unique layouts and functionalities.
subtitle.zh: 创建具有独特布局和功能的自定义键盘。

subtitle.en: Request structured JSON data from the assistant.
subtitle.zh: 从智能助手请求结构化的 JSON 数据。

subtitle.en: Custom tools for the assistant.
subtitle.zh: 自定义提供给智能助手使用的工具。

subtitle.en: This API allows you to build reusable script logic, trigger automation via custom URL schemes, and manage inter-script communication in a structured and efficient manner.
subtitle.zh: 你可以通过该接口访问当前脚本的运行信息、终止脚本并返回结果、在脚本之间调用、以及生成 URL Scheme 以打开或运行脚本。

subtitle.en: Utility modules for common tasks.
subtitle.zh: 用于常见任务的工具模块。

subtitle.en: This class represents binary data and provides methods to convert between various formats.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示二进制数据，并提供在不同格式之间转换的方法。

subtitle.en: This type defines a set of supported character encodings.
subtitle.zh: 该类型定义了支持的字符编码集。

subtitle.en: This class represents an image and provides methods to manipulate and display images.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示图像，并提供操作和显示图像的方法。

subtitle.en: The interface provides an easy way to generate unique UUID strings.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来生成唯一的 UUID 字符串。

subtitle.en: The interface provides simple, secure, and efficient APIs for generating cryptographic hashes from data.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供简单、安全和高效的 API，用于从数据生成加密哈希。

subtitle.en: The interface provides a way to work with date and time components, allowing you to create, manipulate, and format dates easily.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种处理日期和时间组件的方法，使您能够轻松创建、操作和格式化日期。

subtitle.en: This class is used to format Date objects into strings, or parse strings into Date objects.
subtitle.zh: 用于将 Date 类型格式化为字符串，或将字符串解析为 Date。

subtitle.en: The interface provides utilities for working with file and directory paths.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供与文件和目录路径相关的实用工具。

subtitle.en: A convenient interface to the contents of the file system, and the primary means of interacting with it.
subtitle.zh: 一个与文件系统内容进行交互的便捷接口，也是与其进行交互的主要方式。

subtitle.en: This interface allows scripts and HTTP servers to open, read, write, seek, and close files efficiently.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了文件级的读写操作接口，用于在 `HttpServer` 或其他脚本环境中直接读取、写入、定位和关闭文件。

subtitle.en: This class provides a comprehensive interface for working with archive files (such as ZIP).
subtitle.zh: 该类用于读取、创建与修改压缩归档文件（如 ZIP 格式）

subtitle.en: Providing a persistent store for simple data.
subtitle.zh: 为简单数据提供持久化存储。

subtitle.en: Send network requests.
subtitle.zh: 发送网络请求。
发送网络请求
subtitle.en: Send network requests.
The interface represents a complete configuration of an HTTP request.
subtitle.zh: 这些接口表示一个 HTTP 请求的完整配置。

subtitle.en: This class represents the result of an HTTP request made using the fetch() API
subtitle.zh: 该类表示使用 fetch() API 发送的 HTTP 请求的结果。

subtitle.en: This class represents a collection of HTTP request or response header fields.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示 HTTP 请求或响应的头部字段集合。

subtitle.en: This class represents a collection of key/value pairs representing form data.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示表单数据的键值对集合。

subtitle.en: This class represents a stream of data that can be read from.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示可以从中读取数据的流。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to create and manage WebSocket connections, allowing for real-time communication with a server.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你创建和管理 WebSocket 连接的接口，与服务器进行实时通信。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to manage real-time, bidirectional communication between clients and servers with socket.io library.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你通过socket.io库管理客户端与服务器之间的实时双向通信。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to connect to remote servers using SSH protocol, execute commands, and transfer files securely.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你使用 SSH 协议连接到远程服务器，执行命令并安全地传输文件。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to connect to remote servers using SSH protocol.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来使用 SSH 协议连接到远程服务器。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to transfer files securely over SSH using SFTP protocol.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来使用 SFTP 协议通过 SSH 安全地传输文件。

subtitle.en: This interface provides low-level operations such as reading, writing, retrieving attributes, and closing the file.
subtitle.zh: 通过该类，你可以对文件执行读取、写入、获取属性、关闭等底层操作。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to authenticate SSH connections using various methods such as password, public key, or private key.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种使用各种方法（如密码、公钥或私钥）进行 SSH 连接认证的方法。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to write data to the standard input of a TTY session, enabling interactive command execution.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你向 TTY 会话的标准输入写入数据，从而实现交互式命令执行。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to create an HTTP server and handle HTTP requests.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来创建 HTTP 服务器并处理 HTTP 请求。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a lightweight local HTTP server that can handle HTTP requests, serve static files, and manage WebSocket connections
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了在本地或局域网中启动一个轻量级 HTTP 服务器的能力，可用于处理 HTTP 请求、静态文件服务、WebSocket 通信等场景。

subtitle.en: This class represents an HTTP request received by the server.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示一个由客户端发往服务器的 HTTP 请求对象。

subtitle.en: This class represents an HTTP response object returned by the server to the client.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示一个由服务器发往客户端的 HTTP 响应对象。

subtitle.en: This class represents an HTTP response body object returned by the server to the client.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示一个由服务器发往客户端的 HTTP 响应体对象。

subtitle.en: This class represents an active WebSocket connection session.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示一个活跃的 WebSocket 连接会话。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to authenticate users and authorize access to resources using OAuth2 protocol.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来使用 OAuth2 协议进行用户身份验证和资源访问授权。

subtitle.en: This native iOS interface allows you to perform network requests, manage HTTP headers, and handle HTTP responses.
subtitle.zh: iOS原生的URLSession，允许你进行网络请求，管理HTTP头部和处理HTTP响应。

subtitle.en: This interface provides the ability to initiate, resume, and query background download and upload tasks.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供发起、恢复与查询「后台可持续」的下载与上传任务的能力

subtitle.en: Represents a download task instance that can be performed in the foreground or background, and can be resumed after the script is terminated.
subtitle.zh: 表示一个后台下载任务实例，用于在前台或后台下载文件，并可在脚本被终止后继续运行。

subtitle.en: Represents an upload task instance that can be performed in the foreground or background, and can be resumed after the script is terminated.
subtitle.zh: 表示一个后台上传任务实例，用于在前台或后台上传文件，并可在脚本被终止后继续运行。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a simple way to let you manually switch threads.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种简单的方法来让你手动切换线程。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to observe global application state changes, such as scene lifecycle transitions and changes in system-wide appearance (light/dark mode).
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你监听应用程序级别的状态变化事件，例如生命周期（scene phase）变更以及系统外观（light/dark 模式）切换。

subtitle.en: Access the device capabilities.
subtitle.zh: 访问设备功能。

subtitle.en: Provides the information abouts the device, also some methods to use the capabilities of the device.
subtitle.zh: 提供设备相关信息，以及使用设备功能的一些方法。

subtitle.en: Present a website either in-app or leaving the app and opening the system default browser.
subtitle.zh: 在应用内或跳转至系统默认浏览器来展示网站。

subtitle.en: This namspace provides a complete interface for reading, writing, and observing system pasteboard  changes.
subtitle.zh: 该命名空间提供了读取、写入和观察剪贴板变化的完整接口。

subtitle.en: Pick files from Files app.
subtitle.zh: 从文件应用中选择文件。

subtitle.en: The interface that manages access and changes to the user’s photo library.
subtitle.zh: 用于管理用户照片库的访问和变更的接口。

subtitle.en: This namespace provides methods for selecting fonts from the system’s available font list.
subtitle.zh: 该命名空间提供了从系统可用字体列表中选择字体的方法。

subtitle.en: Haptic feedback provides a tactile response, such as a tap, that draws attention and reinforces both actions and events.
subtitle.zh: 触觉反馈提供了触感响应，例如轻点，以引起注意并强化动作或事件。

subtitle.en: The interface to store data in Keychain.
subtitle.zh: 存储数据到钥匙串的接口。

subtitle.en: This interface provides authentication with biometrics such as fingerprint or facial recognition.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供使用指纹或面部识别等生物特征进行认证的功能。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to access and manage contacts on the device. You can create, query, update, and delete contacts, as well as manage contact groups and containers.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许在脚本中访问和管理设备上的联系人数据，包括创建、查询、更新、删除联系人，以及操作联系人组和容器。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to interact with iOS calendars, enabling operations like retrieving default calendars, creating custom calendars, and managing calendar settings and events.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您与 iOS 日历进行交互，例如获取默认日历、创建自定义日历以及管理日历设置和事件。

subtitle.en: This interface enables you to create and manage events in iOS calendars, with properties like title, location, dates, attendees, and recurrence.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您在 iOS 日历中创建和管理事件，设置标题、位置、日期、参与者和重复规则等属性。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to create, edit, and manage reminders in a calendar. This includes setting titles, due dates, priorities, and recurrence rules.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您在日历中创建、编辑和管理提醒事项，包括设置标题、到期日、优先级和重复规则。

subtitle.en: This class represents a reminder rule that can be attached to both CalendarEvent and Reminder objects.
subtitle.zh: 该类表示可以附加到 CalendarEvent 和 Reminder 对象的提醒规则。

subtitle.en: The recurrence-related types and classes allow you to define and manage recurring patterns for events and reminders.
subtitle.zh: 与重复相关的类型和类允许您为事件和提醒事项定义并管理重复模式。

subtitle.en: Getting the current location of your device.
subtitle.zh: 获取设备的当前位置。

subtitle.en: The interface for managing local notification-related activities.
subtitle.zh: 用于管理本地通知相关活动的接口。

subtitle.en: Parse the QR code image file, or open the scan code page to scan.
subtitle.zh: 解析二维码图像文件，或打开扫码页面进行扫描。

subtitle.en: You can share data from your script using this interface.
subtitle.zh: 您可以通过此接口从脚本中共享数据。

subtitle.en: A simple way to preview text, images, or files within your scripts
subtitle.zh: 用于在脚本中预览文本、图片或文件。

subtitle.en: It is designed for use cases like custom in-app browsers, rendering dynamic HTML, or communicating with JavaScript running in a web context.
subtitle.zh: 它允许你在脚本中加载 HTML、展示 Web 页面、执行 JavaScript 脚本，并与页面中的 JavaScript 进行消息通信。

subtitle.en: The shared audio session instance. An audio session acts as an intermediary between your app and the operating system — and, in turn, the underlying audio hardware.
subtitle.zh: 共享音频会话实例。音频会话充当应用与操作系统以及底层音频硬件之间的中介。

subtitle.en: Text To Speech.
subtitle.zh: 将文字转换为语音。

subtitle.en: The interface for managing the speech recognizer process.
subtitle.zh: 用于管理语音识别过程的接口。

subtitle.en: The interface allows you to record audio data to a file. It provides functionalities to start, stop, pause, and manage audio recordings, with configurable settings for audio quality, sample rate, format, and more.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您将音频数据录制到文件中，提供开始、停止、暂停和管理音频录制的功能，并可配置音频质量、采样率、格式等设置。

subtitle.en: AVMetadataItem is a class that represents a metadata item in an audio or video asset.
subtitle.zh: AVMetadataItem 是一个类，表示音频或视频资源中的元数据项。

subtitle.en: The interface allows for playback of both local and network audio sources, and offers controls such as play, pause, stop, volume, and more.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许播放本地和网络音源，并提供播放、暂停、停止、音量控制等功能。
在脚本中播放视频
subtitle.en: Play Video in Script
VideoPlayer view lets you playback movies from any URL, local or remote.
subtitle.zh: VideoPlayer 视图允许您播放来自任意 URL（本地或远程）的影片。

subtitle.en: This component is intended for media-centric scenarios where native playback behavior, PiP, Now Playing integration, and background playback are required.
subtitle.zh: 该组件适用于需要原生播放行为、画中画、Now Playing 集成以及后台播放的媒体中心场景。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to interact with the Now Playing Center, manage Now Playing Info, and respond to remote control events.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许与 Now Playing Center 交互，管理 Now Playing Info，并响应远程控制事件。

subtitle.en: This interface provides access to real-time and forecast weather data.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供对实时天气和天气预报数据的访问。

subtitle.en: This interface provides access to health-related data, allowing you to read and write health records.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供对健康相关数据的访问，允许您读取和写入健康记录。

subtitle.en: iOS HealthKit-specific permission behavior.
subtitle.zh: iOS HealthKit 特有的授权机制。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health characteristic data from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康特征数据。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health quantity samples from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康数量样本。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health category samples from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康分类样本。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health correlation data from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康关联数据。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health workout samples from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康锻炼样本。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health heartbeat series samples from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康心跳序列样本。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to read health activity summaries from the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您从 HealthKit 存储中读取健康活动摘要。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to query statistics for health data, such as average, minimum, maximum, and sum for health quantity samples.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您查询健康数据的统计信息，如健康数量样本的平均值、最小值、最大值和总和。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to query a collection of health statistics, such as average, minimum, maximum, and sum for health quantity samples over a specified time period.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您查询一组健康统计数据，如在指定时间段内的健康数量样本的平均值、最小值、最大值和总和。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to write health quantity samples to the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您将健康数量样本写入 HealthKit 存储。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to write health category samples to the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您将健康分类样本写入 HealthKit 存储。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to write health correlation data to the HealthKit store.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您将健康关联数据写入 HealthKit 存储。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to define and manage health quantity types, which represent measurable health data such as steps, heart rate, or calories burned.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种定义和管理健康数量型数据的方法，表示可测量的健康数据，如步数、心率或燃烧的卡路里。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to define and manage health category types, which represent qualitative health data such as sleep analysis, mood, or menstrual cycle.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种定义和管理健康分类数据的方法，表示定性的健康数据，如睡眠分析、情绪或月经周期。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to define and manage health category value types, which represent specific values for health category data such as sleep stages or mood states.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种定义和管理健康分类值类型的方法，表示健康分类数据的特定值，如睡眠阶段或情绪状态。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to define and manage health units, which represent the measurement units for health data such as kilograms, meters, or beats per minute.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种定义和管理健康单位的方法，表示健康数据的测量单位，如千克、米或每分钟心跳次数。

subtitle.en: An enumeration of health characteristics such as biological sex, blood type, skin type, wheelchair use, and activity mobility patterns.
subtitle.zh: 生物性别、血型、皮肤类型、轮椅使用情况和活动移动模式的枚举。

subtitle.en: Represents a health quantity sample, such as a heart rate measurement, recorded steps, or calories consumed.
subtitle.zh: 表示一条健康数量类型的数据样本，例如一次心率测量、记录的步数或摄入的热量。

subtitle.en: Represents a health category sample, such as sleep analysis, menstrual flow, ovulation test results, etc.
subtitle.zh: 表示一条基于分类的健康事件记录，例如睡眠分析、月经流量、排卵测试结果等。

subtitle.en: Represents a health correlation, which is a relationship between two or more health data samples, such as blood pressure readings and heart rate.
subtitle.zh: 表示健康关联，即两个或多个健康数据样本之间的关系，例如血压读数和心率。

subtitle.en: Represents a health workout event, such as a start or end of a workout session, or a pause in the workout.
subtitle.zh: 表示一条健康锻炼事件记录，例如锻炼会话的开始或结束，或锻炼中的暂停。

subtitle.en: An enumeration of health workout activity types, such as running, cycling, swimming, etc.
subtitle.zh: 健康锻炼活动类型的枚举，例如跑步、骑自行车、游泳等。

subtitle.en: Represents a health workout, which is a structured activity such as running, cycling, or swimming, with associated metadata like duration, distance, and calories burned.
subtitle.zh: 表示一条健康锻炼数据记录，即结构化的活动，如跑步、骑自行车或游泳，带有持续时间、距离和燃烧的卡路里等相关元数据。

subtitle.en: Represents a series of heartbeat samples, which can be used to analyze heart rate variability or other cardiac metrics.
subtitle.zh: 表示一系列心跳样本，可用于分析心率变异性或其他心脏指标。

subtitle.en: Represents a summary of daily activity, including steps taken, distance traveled, and calories burned.
subtitle.zh: 表示每日活动的摘要，包括步数、行驶距离和燃烧的卡路里。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to calculate statistics for health data, such as average, minimum, maximum, and sum for health quantity samples.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种计算健康数据统计信息的方法，如健康数量样本的平均值、最小值、最大值和总和。

subtitle.en: This interface provides a way to collect and manage statistics for health data over a specified time period, such as average, minimum, maximum, and sum for health quantity samples.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了一种在指定时间段内收集和管理健康数据统计信息的方法，如健康数量样本的平均值、最小值、最大值和总和。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to present a mail compose view within your app. You can specify recipients, subject, body, and attachments.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了在应用内直接唤起邮件撰写视图的能力，支持添加收件人、抄送、密送、主题、正文以及附件。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to send messages using the device's messaging capabilities, such as SMS or iMessage.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许您使用设备的消息功能发送信息，例如短信或 iMessage。

subtitle.en: The module provides APIs for text recognition tasks.
subtitle.zh: 该模块提供了用于文本识别的 API。

subtitle.en: A high-level interface for interacting with PDF files.
subtitle.zh: 通过该API高效地操作 PDF 文件。

subtitle.en: This interface provides language translation capabilities, allowing you to translate text between different languages.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供语言翻译功能，允许您在不同语言之间翻译文本。

subtitle.en: This interface provides classes to scan, connect, and exchange data with Bluetooth devices.
subtitle.zh: 提供蓝牙相关的API，允许你扫描、连接和与蓝牙设备交换数据。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to scan for, connect to, and interact with nearby Bluetooth peripherals.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你扫描、连接和与附近的蓝牙外设进行交互。

subtitle.en: This interface provides properties and methods for interacting with the device, including connecting, discovering services and characteristics, reading/writing values, and subscribing to notifications.
subtitle.zh: 表示一个 BLE 外围设备对象，支持读取设备信息、连接状态、发现服务与特征值、读取写入数据、订阅通知等。

subtitle.en: This interface represents a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) service. A service is a logical grouping of related characteristics and possibly other included services.
subtitle.zh: 表示一个 BLE（低功耗蓝牙）服务。服务是外围设备中功能的逻辑分组，包含一个或多个特征值（`Characteristic`），也可以包含对其他服务的引用（包含服务）。

subtitle.en: This interface represents a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) service. A service is a logical grouping of related characteristics and possibly other included services.
subtitle.zh: 表示蓝牙服务（`BluetoothService`）中的一个特征值，是 BLE 设备数据交互的核心单元。

subtitle.en: This interface allows you to create a Bluetooth peripheral that can advertise services and characteristics, and accept connections from central devices.
subtitle.zh: 该接口允许你创建一个蓝牙外设，可以广播服务和特征，并接受来自中央设备的连接。

subtitle.en: This interface provides methods for keeping the Scripting app running in the background.
subtitle.zh: 该接口提供了用于保持 Scripting 应用在后台运行的方法。
